DOC.brief_summary: To compare APACHE II P-POSSUM score system emergency laparotomy .
DOC.detailed_description: To compare APACHE II P-POSSUM score system predict postoperative mortality patient undergoing emergency laparotomy .
DOC.criteria: All patient 18 year age undergoing emergency laparotomy Tata Main Hospital form 01st December 2013 30th November 2014 include study . Patients willingly seek referral different hospital
